rulesStrings.li: generic->I hope you save over the wrong canvas.
generic->I hope you'll have to redo every line you ever draw, forever.
generic->Drawing hands isn't easy, but yours look like malformed sausages.
generic->I hope you draw in the wrong layer.
generic->You would draw with incorrect proportions even if you traced over a reference.
generic->Your art looks like an NFT.
generic->Your digital art is not real art.
generic->You are the physical embodiment of purple prose. Self important and utterly meaningless.
generic->The extent of your "writing talents" only encompasses those terrible back-and-forth dialogues plaguing Tumblr.
recipient_ugly_jpg->Your face looks like someone put you through JPEG compression.
